picks.full-pick-text: MacBook Pro is refreshed with a new chip
picks.notes: • There is some question as to whether a pick from 3 games ago includes the 2025 game that was graded moments ago, and it is decided that it does. Now that ahead of their time picks grant bonus picks, this throwback from 2023 can now be used.

picks.text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen. It is an update to an existing notebook. macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch. The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box.
picks.notes:
• "It is an update to an existing notebook." (in other words, not a new line like "MacBook Touch")
  • "macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch." (Specifically, the macOS on this machine does not have a custom UI compared to a non-touch Mac.)
  • "The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box."

picks.text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024
picks.full-pick-text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024. Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.' Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year. Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship.
picks.notes:
• "Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.'"
  • "Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year."
  • "Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship."

picks.text: Apple ships a foldable phone that:
picks.full-pick-text: Apple ships a foldable phone that: Is called 'iPhone Duo.' Runs both iOS and iPadOS apps and seamlessly switches between them. Has a feature that operates both the outer and inner screens at the same time.
picks.notes:
• "Is called 'iPhone Duo.'"
  • "Runs both iOS and iPadOS apps and seamlessly switches between them."
  • "Has a feature that operates both the outer and inner screens at the same time."
